io.wcm.wcm.ui.extjs.provider

Class AbstractPageTreeProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • org.apache.sling.api.servlets.SlingSafeMethodsServlet
        • io.wcm.wcm.ui.extjs.provider.AbstractPageProvider
          • io.wcm.wcm.ui.extjs.provider.AbstractPageTreeProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @ConsumerType
public abstract class AbstractPageTreeProvider
extends AbstractPageProvider
    Exports the resource tree at the addressed resource in JSON format to the response. This can be used by the io.wcm.wcm.ui.form.BrowseField widget. Abstract implementation, some methods can be overwritten by subclasses.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
